block.p: In the early 1960s, I rooted against Roger Maris because I thought this would help my boyhood hero, Mickey Mantle. When Mantle was hurt down the stretch in '61 while chasing Babe Ruth's home run record, I prayed for Maris to get hurt. I'm sad now that I didn't revel in the greatness and synergy of the two men slugging their way through a remarkable Yankee season. I'm sad that I didn't root for the fine gentleman and great Yankee that Maris was.
